entry.tran: 永无止境的;永无休止的;永恒的
entry.def: If you describe something bad or unpleasant as never-ending, you are emphasizing that it seems to last a very long time.

example.ex: The spiral of terrorism becomes never-ending.
example.tran: 恐怖主义活动没完没了，不断升级。
